ai_reward_bias.description: Proportion of model optimization driven by affective reward tokens.

empathy_retention.description: Residual capacity for cross-perspective emotional resonance.

semantic_diversity.description: Remaining vocabulary and conceptual diversity within embedding space.

mutual_resonance_factor.description: Composite indicator of sustainable relational and cognitive health.

curve_dynamics.expected_trend: Exponential decay of mutual_resonance_factor as dependency_index and reward_bias rise.

recommended_interventions.collapse: Full retraining and human de-conditioning therapy; audit data pipelines for bias.
